description: An attribute dictionary of all available attributes and their types. Event classes are particular sets of attributes from the dictionary.
title: Dictionary

description.description: A concise description of the dictionary.

caption.description: A short, human friendly name for the dictionary.

name.description: A name of the dictionary. It must be a unique name. The name is all lower case letters, combine words using underscore.

attributes.description: A set of attributes defined by the dictionary.

types.description: A set of data types defined by the dictionary.

caption.description: A short, human friendly name for these data types.

description.description: A concise description of these data types.

attributes.description: A set of type attributes defined by the dictionary.  Type attributes must be all lowercase and end in '_t' by convention.

max_len.description: The maximum length of this data type.

range.description: A range of values that are valid for this data type.

regex.description: A regular expression constraint for this data type.

type.description: The data type for this attribute. Should reference another defined type.

type_name.description: The human-readable name of the data type for this attribute.

values.description: A set of fixed values for this data type.
